abstract.para: The topic covers the preparation of the machine for the deployment.

topic.para: Before you start deploying &productnameshort;, you need to check if all the three needed DASD disks are active. To check the disks' state, run the command:
The 5 GB disk will be used as a configuration device, and the 20 GB disk is the disk where &productname; will be deployed.
If you do not see the disks in the command output, you need to activate the disks. To do so, proceed as follows:

step.para: Run the lszdev dasd to display a full list of devices:
step.screen:
&prompt.root;lszdev dasd
TYPE ID ON PERS NAMES dasd-eckd 0.0.0100 yes no dasda dasd-eckd 0.0.0101 no no dasd-eckd 0.0.0102 no no dasd-eckd 0.0.0190 no no dasd-eckd 0.0.019d no no dasd-eckd 0.0.019e no no dasd-eckd 0.0.0592 no no
